text: The 1960/61 NTFL season was the 40th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Nightcliff have won there 2nd premiership title while defeating St Marys in the grand final by 14 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Works and Housing (Nightcliff) | 10.8 (68) - 6.18 (54) | St. Marys |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1960/61 NTFL season
